resources.name: resources
resources.short_desc: Define resource routes for a plural resource.
resources.long_desc:
This defines the following routes, for the resource 'posts':

 GET /posts           | posts#index
 GET /posts/new       | posts#new
 GET /posts/{id}      | posts#show
 GET /posts/{id}/edit | posts#edit
 POST /posts          | posts#create
 PUT /posts/{id}      | posts#update
 DELETE /posts/{id}   | posts#delete

resource.name: resource
resource.short_desc: Define resource routes for a singular resource (a resource where there can be only one of it)
resource.long_desc:
This defines the following routes for a resource "profile":

 GET /profile      | profile#show
 GET /profile/new  | profile#new
 GET /profile/edit | profile#edit
 POST /profile     | profile#create
 PUT /profile      | profile#update
 DELETE /profile   | profile#delete
